channel.title: Compiler Help!
channel.description:
Client compiler is not working, i will provide my compiler code and the errors i am getting below:
[COMPILER] [code=actionscript]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause[/code]
[ERROR] [code=actionscript] Unrecognized option -d Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I cannot use Teamviewer, due to the trial being up. I can do skype with screen show i have good connection so it wont lag a bit. Skype name: xDetrick Online 24/7

item.title: Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @methodd methodd
item.description:
@methodd wrote:

Client compiler is not working, i will provide my compiler code and the errors i am getting below:

[COMPILER]

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause

[ERROR]

Unrecognized option -d Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit Press any key to continue . . .

I cannot use Teamviewer, due to the trial being up. I can do skype with screen show i have good connection so it wont lag a bit.
Skype name: xDetrick
Online 24/7
